nodes.text: Marc Alan Cerasini is an American author and the writer of several Star Wars books, Godzilla novels, 24 novels for Fox/Imagine, and the New York Times bestselling true crime book, OJ Simpson, American Hero, American Tragedy, and the tie-in Alien vs Predator for 20th Century Fox. .

Marc Alan Cerasini was born in Carnegie, Pennsylvania in 1952. He graduated from Ohio University and worked as a magazine editor, literary critic, and author.  Throughout his career, Cerasini has written numerous books (many of which have appeared on The New York Times' and USA Today's best-seller's lists), and has worked with authors such as Tom Clancy.
